text: @CNN On January 31, Trump was declared a racist xenophobe for restricting Chinese travel, by the same folks now wailing about defunding the WHO. Which didn’t declare #coronavirus a pandemic until 40 days later, but did tell us earlier in January we didn’t have to be concerned.
